page.title: 04AMENITIES IN GOOSTREY
page.content: {Schools}Goostrey has a Primary School but at 11 children have to travel to the comprehensive at Holmes Chapel. There is a private school,Terra Nova, at Jodrell Bank.There is a play group. {Shops}There are a few shops in the village.Many people do their main grocery shopping in the supermarkets in Northwich, Holmes Chapel,Crewe and other nearby towns.Large consumer items, such as electrical goods,are bought from as far afield as Chester, Manchester and Birmingham. {Health}The nearest doctor,dentist and chemist are at Holmes Chapel. {Leisure Centre}The nearest is at Holmes Chpel.Swimming pools are at Congleton, Northwich and Sandbach. {Library}The nearest is at Holmes Chapel.A library van visits Goostrey.
